subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Tom Watson, 59, a five-time British Open champion, shot a five-under 65 and is tied for second after the first round, one shot behind Miguel Ángel Jiménez.
snippet: Tom Watson, 59, a five-time British Open champion, shot a five-under 65 and is tied for second after the first round, one shot behind Miguel Ángel Jiménez.
